channel.title: How to change firecape so when you die you keep it
channel.description: can someone show me where to go and what i have to change so u dont lose firecape on death you keep it

item.title: How to change firecape so when you die you keep it
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

this is alittle bit common sense, just keep searching the firecape ID in client.java and delete the method you think is making you lose it when you die. something like deathstage should help

Read full topic
